doc:
Charles Miller (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Miller_(director) 0 Charles A. Miller (1857 – November 14, 1936) was an American actor and silent film director. Before taking up directing, he was an actor. Miller was born in Saginaw, Michigan and died in New York City. Charles_A._Miller ( 1857 – November_14_,_1936 ) was an_American_actor and silent_film_director . Before taking up directing , he was an_actor . Miller was_born in Saginaw , Michigan and died in New_York_City .
